note: This data is expressed in constant 2021 US$.
title: Net official development assistance to medical research and basic health sectors
subtitle: Net [official development assistance](#dod:oda) to medical research and basic health sectors. This data is expressed in US dollars. It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in the cost of living between countries.
selectedEntityNames: Developed regions (Europe, Cyprus, Israel, Northern America, Japan, Australia & New Zealand)
